meanings.definition: Fritts (noun): A type of small, fried doughnut.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious fritts for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fritts in various flavors.
meanings.sent3: At the fair, I ate so many fritts that I felt like a doughnut myself!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a fritts.
meanings.sent5: The warm fritts melted in my mouth like sugary clouds.

meanings.definition: Fritts (verb): To fry something quickly in hot oil.
meanings.sent1: She fritts the potatoes until they turn golden brown.
meanings.sent2: The chef will fritts the chicken for tonight's dinner.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally fritts my hair while cooking - oops!
meanings.sent4: The sun fritts the pavement on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the fritts filled the kitchen with a tempting aroma.
